levy.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to officially say that people must pay a tax or charge

levy.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: an additional sum of money, usually paid as a tax

levy.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: to officially make someone pay a tax etc

levy.translation[3].definitions[1].defin: a charge paid by members of a professional association or TRADE UNION
